mean_en: an official examination of the facts about a situation, crime, etc.;  a scientific or academic examination of the facts of a subject or problem
sentence: The biologist conducted an investigation into the species of birds in the forest.
sentence_trans: 生物学家对这片森林中鸟的种类进行了调查。
word_etyma: in向内，进入 + vestig脚印，踪迹 + ation名词后缀，表示行为、状态、过程 → 调查研究
